message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. This is my counter-offer.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counter-offer
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us.
I'll give a little, but I still think I deserve more
Let's split this evenly and call it a day.  Every round is costing us both.
